title: Game Night Tuesdays
description: We meet every Tuesday at 7pm in the basement of First Methodist at 2nd and Main St.

title: Monthly Game Mondays
description: A small group of friends playing lots of different kinds of games.

title: Chess Club
description: We play chess and sometimes turn based strategy card games, mostly Magik

title: Cards at Bernice's House
description: We try to meet once on the last Friday of every month to play Gin Rummy, Cribbage, or Hearts.  We vote each time at the beginning to decide what to play.

title: Friday Night Games
description: 2nd Friday of every month in Carl's garage

title: Games on Sundays
description: Every other Sunday we play casual board games together

title: All Games Welcome
description: We'll play anything.  Bring a game, and we'll try it!

title: Manic Monday Game Night
description: Games every Monday night at 7pm at the Veteran's Hall.  All games welcome.
